title: Close Out a Transaction File
description: A property has successfully closed. The TC needs to perform the final steps to close the file.

tasks.description: Obtain the final closing statement and deed from the title company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives and verifies the final documents.

tasks.description: Upload all final documents to the transaction system and ensure the file is complete for compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: All closing documents are added to the file, and the file passes a compliance check.

tasks.description: Change the status of the listing to 'Sold' in the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The MLS listing is updated with the final sale price and status.
